en: Judge me, O Jehovah, for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in Jehovah without wavering.
hmr: Aw LALPA, ro mi rêlpêk rawh, lungril ṭhatak putin ka um sih a, Ringhla loin LALPA chu ka ring bawk a.

en: Examine me, O Jehovah, and prove me; Try my heart and my mind.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi enfiein mi fie la, Ka lungril le ka lungvar hi sukthieng la,

en: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes; And I have walked in thy truth.
hmr: I ngilneizie chu ka hmaah a um sih a, I thutaka chun ka um rawp bawk a.

en: I have not sat with men of falsehood; Neither will I go in with dissemblers.
hmr: Mi hmangnabohai kâwlah ka ṭhung ngai nawh a, Mi vervêkhai kuoma khawm ka lût ngai bawk nawh.

en: I hate the assembly of evil-doers, And will not sit with the wicked.
hmr: Thil ṭha naw thawtuhai inkhâwm chu ka theidah a, Mi rilohai kâwlah ṭhung naw ningah.

en: I will wash my hands in innocency: So will I compass thine altar, O Jehovah;
hmr: Ka kuthai hi demkailonain sâwp ka ta, Chuong ang chun, aw LALPA, i mâichâm chu fe huol ka tih.

en: That I may make the voice of thanksgiving to be heard, And tell of all thy wondrous works.
hmr: Lâwmthu hrilna ka sukrîk thei a, I thilmak thaw po po thuhai chu ka hril theina dingin.

en: Jehovah, I love the habitation of thy house, And the place where thy glory dwelleth.
hmr: LALPA, i umna in chu ka ngaina a, I ropuina umna khawm chu.

en: Gather not my soul with sinners, Nor my life with men of blood;
hmr: Mi suolhai laia chun mi peisa naw la, Ka hringna khawm hi thisen insuo hmanghai lai chun la sa bawk naw rawh.

en: In whose hands is wickedness, And their right hand is full of bribes.
hmr: An kuta chun ngaituona suol a um a, An kut changtieng chu thamnain a sip a;

en: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: Redeem me, and be merciful unto me.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, kei chu lungril ṭhatak putin um ka tih, Mîn tlan la, mi lunginsiet rawh.

en: My foot standeth in an even place: In the congregations will I bless Jehovah.
hmr: Ka ke hi hmun inzâwltakah a ngîr a, Inkhâwmnaahai chun LALPA chu inpâk ka tih.
